articles.title: Rays-Royals rained out, will play two on Saturday - Tampa Bay Times
articles.description: Notes | Heavy rains and high winds lead to a postponement and a shuffle of Tampa Bay’s pitching plans.
articles.content:
KANSAS CITY The Rays got an extra day on their All-Star break.
